Name: Escape - The Speedrun Game
About the game: The premise of the game is to escape the game level as quickly as possible. When you escape the level you will be presented with your final time spent trying to escape. Avoid obstacles, traps, and figure your way out of the map asap! This is a great game for speed running! Key Features: 1. Collect Gems To Get A Faster Time! 2. Speedrun Each Level, 5 Total Levels! 3. Avoid Traps And Tricks! 4. Steam Achievements 5. Steam Leaderboard For Each Level! 6. Level Unlock System!
